definitions: If you use strident to describe someone or the way they express themselves, you mean that they make their feelings or opinions known in a very strong way that perhaps makes people uncomfortable.
If a voice or sound is strident, it is loud, harsh, and unpleasant to listen to.
(of a shout, voice, etc) having or making a loud or harsh sound
making or having a harsh sound; grating; creaking
having a shrill, irritating quality or character
characterized acoustically by noise of relatively high intensity, as sibilants, labiodental and uvular fricatives, and most affricates
